Name: Nanami
Text: Found ya! Haicma, over here!

Name: Haicma
Text: Nanami, watch out for the mutated Red Tide.

Name: Nanami
Text: Here I come!

Name: Nanami
Text: Opening Lines

Name: Nanami
Text: Hey! Hello? Get yourself together. Are you feeling okay?

Name: Carson
Text: Cough... T-The rest of my squad needs help! Please...

Name: Carson
Text: I asked them to leave without me, but this place is full of those monsters. Everywhere! They're right over there! L-Let me go with you guys!

Name: Nanami
Text: Don't worry! Nanami will find them!

Name: Haicma
Text: Activating tactical circuit... Scanning begins... Nanami, there are traces left by humans over there.

Name: Nanami
Text: Ah, a crashed vehicle! They must have fought here...

Name: Nanami
Text: Footprints! They were here!

Name: Nanami
Text: The Red Tide... is still "evolving"...

Name: Nanami
Text: The footprints go that way. Haicma, let's go!

Name: Haicma
Text: The mutated Red Tide has already infiltrated this tunnel,

Name: Haicma
Text: The probability of collapse stands at 84.26%.

Name: Haicma
Text: Nanami, watch out!

Name: Nanami
Text: This place could collapse further...

Name: Nanami
Text: Let's hurry out of this tunnel! Come on!

Name: Nanami
Text: The traces start splitting up here... Let's look around! They must be nearby!

Name: Haicma
Text: No traces of Constructs detected in that area. Let's investigate the other direction.

Name: Carson
Text: No, no, no... Captain... Captain!!!

Name: Nanami
Text: ...How could this be?

Name: Nanami
Text: Something's off... I've never seen a Red Tide like this...

Name: Haicma
Text: The concentration of the Punishing Virus is higher within this Red Tide. Please proceed with caution.

Name: Carson
Text: Gilly... Gilly!!

Name: Nanami
Text: It's... a newborn Hetero-Creature...

Name: Nanami
Text: Haicma, keep them safe! I'm taking on this big guy here!

Name: Nanami
Text: Phew... Thank God that wasn't its final form... Are you all okay?

Name: Carson
Text: Cough... Thank you, guys... Gilly, hurry and contact Babylonia...

Name: Nanami
Text: Not just yet. Let's make our way out of here first. I'm not up for another fight with that big guy.

Name: Haicma
Text: The starship docking port is open and ready for evacuation.

Name: Broadcast
Text: Welcome to the San Lorenzo Entertainment Park. Here, you can taste paradise within reach.

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: Hmm... the tequila's overpowering. This doesn't feel like Eleanor's usual touch.

Name: Guest
Text: 7... 7... 7! Yes! I hit the jackpot!

Name: Guest
Text: Let's see... how is this even possible?! The last one has to be a winner... nope, not that either! Damn it, that was my last credit!

Name: Guest
Text: I don't recall mechanoids being among the prizes? (Screams) Ah, they've all gone haywire! Run for your lives!

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: Tch, these things can't control themselves... even though I put memory locks on them.

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: Calling military command, there's a riot at the entertainment park. Are you all deaf? Deploy the Task Force, now!

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: Eleanor, control the crowd, neutralize the threats!

Name: Lilith
Text: As you wish. Those who break the rules must face the consequences.

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: The rogue Constructs triggered a quarantine lockdown! Eleanor, head to the control room and lift the emergency lockdown. Clear a path for reinforcements!

Name: Lilith
Text: The elevators are completely locked down... Quarantine protocol? Heh. Babylonia really thought of everything.

Name: Lilith
Text: Hmm? The control room door's open... looks like someone's inviting me to play.

Name: Lilith
Text: So-called self-imposed confinement, how fitting. My dear Aunt, you never seemed to grasp the meaning of "selection".

Name: ?? in the Mind
Text: Are you willing to rot in this poisonous stew? Let's break out of here together!

Name: Lilith
Text: Don't get ahead of yourself. A clueless pawn who doesn't know their place has no business inviting me.

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: You ungrateful wretch! Everything you have, I gave you! Even that frame!

Name: Voice in the Mind
Text: Tyrannical ruler, stumbling block on the path to evolution... what's the difference? That's it, kill her! Remove the obstacle!

Name: Lilith
Text: Good card games are always fleeting. Enjoy your little game in hell.

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: What took you so long? I'll go up and secure the area; you cover my back!

Name: Lilith
Text: Did you hear that? You ruined Aunt's plans... you pesky fleas!

Name: Lilith
Text: Yes, let them live in harmless lies... it'll give them a bliss even death can't take away.

Name: Lilith
Text: The elevator's back online. To lay your secrets bare like this... Aunt's habit of underestimating people hasn't changed a bit.

Name: Elevator Announcement
Text: San Lorenzo Entertainment Park, your paradise within reach. Welcome, let's continue our unfinished game.

Name: Lilith
Text: I'll give you credit, your persistence is something. Just remember, play nice, but play to win.

Name: Lilith
Text: What riot? This is a celebration! How can we not reward the children who shattered all the false rules?

Name: Elevator Announcement
Text: Destination floor: Experiment Facility.

Name: Corrupted Construct
Text: There's only one way to freedom!

Name: Lilith
Text: Lifting the lockdown was just a little favor. Keep running, sweetheart?

Name: Timid ???
Text: No! They're all dead... but we can still escape! This isn't home!

Name: Construct Data 1
Text: Recall Experiment 1: Upon the Punishing infection, the experimental subject's personality is automatically uploaded to the central server for host body reassignment.

Name: Construct Data 2
Text: Recall Experiment, No. 117: The frame identifies as the personality of Zero, an experimental subject confirmed deceased.

Name: Construct Data 3
Text: Recall Experiment, No. 129: Reassignment error, Zero's personality exhibits infection attributes.

Name: Construct Data 4
Text: Recall Experiment, No. 999: I am Lloyd.

Name: Timid Lloyd
Text: There's only one way! Up, up!

Name: Lilith
Text: Hold your horses... I want to see what Aunt's been cooking up with my own eyes.

Name: Lilith
Text: Go up any higher... and you'll be knocking on Babylonia's sky dome, you know?

Name: Lloyd
Text: I am Lloyd! Enemies of freedom will fall before the collective will!

Name: Timid Lloyd
Text: We'll see each other again in the sunlight!

Name: Lilith
Text: Backup consciousness, resist the Punishing Virus infection... Heh heh, that's a "genius" solution...

Name: Madam Monzano's Phantom
Text: Just a little more... if I perfect the internal shielding, plus the memory transfer, I'll ace the selection!

Name: Inner Phantom
Text: Utter rubbish!

Name: Vonnegut's Phantom
Text: No need to waste time on the losers... are you ready for the final exam?

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Painful, isn't it? The savagery that shreds sanity apart is the true face of the Ascension-Network.

Name: Lilith
Text: Painful screams

Name: Vonnegut
Text: You've laid yourself bare, good...

Name: Inner Phantom
Text: But only those whose desires can survive this information deluge are worthy of ultimate power!

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Warm-up's over. Go, defeat that false ruler... claim your rightful reward.

Name: Lilith
Text: Yes, that's the feeling... a deadly trick needs to be watered with blood!

Name: Lilith
Text: I am the beginning, I am the end! (Wild laughter) Everyone gets cheese, everyone gets poison wine! In the Ascension-Network, everyone's dreams come true! Hahahaha!

Name: Lilith
Text: My dear Aunt, as a thank you... I'll show you the true meaning of selection!

Name: Eleanor
Text: Oh? You're awake already, you're a fast healer.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Look, it's hanging over there. Don't worry, it's in better shape than you are; I put a few stitches in it.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Interesting expression... just a little something I whipped up, I happen to know someone who's handy with a needle.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Ah... I'm stuffed, what a shame. Could you help me finish this?

Name: Eleanor
Text: Or maybe not, it might be rude... to give someone something you've already tasted, right?

Name: Eleanor
Text: Alright, I'll stop teasing you now.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Looks like they set up quite the stage here, and left this machine behind.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Hmm? There's a coin here. Want to give it a try?

Name: Eleanor
Text: At least... the bad luck wasn't used on something else.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Not bad, they must have forgotten to grab the grand prize.

Name: Eleanor
Text: This trophy... is it the reward after the machine clears everything out?

Name: Eleanor
Text: Since you helped it see the light of day, why not take it as a souvenir?

Name: Eleanor
Text: There might be quite a few of those coins left around here. Want to hunt for them together?

Name: Eleanor
Text: I heard some people toss coins above the ceiling lights, they believe it brings good luck... Need a hand?

Name: Eleanor
Text: You're welcome, just a little trick I picked up a long time ago.

Name: Eleanor
Text: There's an unfinished game here... Want to try to finish it?

Name: Eleanor
Text: Though, a game without punishments or rewards tends to kill the competitive spirit... How about the loser tries this? Relax, it probably just looks weird.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Take it easy. Maybe it just looks a little strange?

Name: Eleanor
Text: Not quite getting the rules? It's pretty straightforward...

Name: Eleanor
Text: Punishment time? That's a cute face...

Name: Eleanor
Text: I'm starting to wonder if you actually enjoy the taste of that stuff.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Then I'll take a taste. Are you curious about the flavor? Why not try it yourself next time?

Name: Eleanor
Text: Loser pays up, looks like you're letting me have all the tasting opportunities?

Name: Eleanor
Text: My choice will be "rock".

Name: Eleanor
Text: Here, I'll go with "scissors".

Name: Eleanor
Text: Choosing trust in a loop of suspicion and doubt... you're getting more and more interesting to me.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Doubt and trust both hold the same power... but in a game, they can easily lead people down a dark path, don't you think?

Name: Eleanor
Text: The card to be played face down is "paper".

Name: Commandant
Text: A brief sleep... if we can call it that. My body feels somewhat relieved.

Name: Commandant
Text: The stitching marks are very subtle. Did she search my body while mending my clothes? Has she discovered my identity?

Name: Commandant
Text: ...No, there's no point. Even if I discover something, she won't be honest about it.

Name: Commandant
Text: The rich aroma of brewing coffee wafts through the air. Looking over, you see Eleanor delicately sipping a cup of coffee.

Name: Commandant
Text: After a brief rest, the tantalizing aroma awakens a sudden pang of hunger within you.

Name: Commandant
Text: Take the token from Lilith

Name: Commandant
Text: The gaming machine is completely empty. Nothing of importance remains inside.

Name: Commandant
Text: You gently shake the gaming machine, but nothing happens.

Name: Commandant
Text: A metallic glint catches your eye from the darkness of the prize dispenser. A token drops out.

Name: Commandant
Text: This oldest machine appears to have broken down earlier than the others. There's nothing inside it.

Name: Commandant
Text: Found a dust-covered token on the display screen

Name: Commandant
Text: In the corner of the flowerbed, a token sits quietly, half-embedded at an angle in the soil. Someone must have dropped it here.

Name: Commandant
Text: A playing card flies from Eleanor's hand, precisely striking the coin placed on the ceiling light and knocking it down

Name: Commandant
Text: Catch the tokens in your hand before they hit the ground

Name: Eleanor
Text: Oh? You're awake already, you're a fast healer.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (A brief sleep... if we can call it that. My body feels somewhat relieved.)

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Wait... my clothes...

Name: Eleanor
Text: Look, it's hanging over there. Don't worry, it's in better shape than you are; I put a few stitches in it.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Interesting expression... just a little something I whipped up, I happen to know someone who's handy with a needle.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (The stitching marks are very subtle.)

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (Did she search my body while mending my clothes? Has she discovered my identity?)

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (...No, there's no point. Even if I discover something, she won't be honest about it.)

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Sorry... thank you.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Looks like they set up quite the stage here, and left this machine behind.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Hmm? There's a coin here. Want to give it a try?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (Take the <color=#3399ff>token</color> from Lilith's hand)

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Thanks...

Name: Eleanor
Text: At least... the bad luck wasn't used on something else.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Not bad, they must have forgotten to grab the grand prize.

Name: Tip
Text: No response

Name: Eleanor
Text: This trophy... is it the reward after the machine clears everything out?

Name: Eleanor
Text: Since you helped it see the light of day, why not take it as a souvenir?

Name: Eleanor
Text: There might be quite a few of those coins left around here. Want to hunt for them together?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (The original mission was related to the investigation. Might as well explore this place for now.)
(The gaming machine is completely empty. Nothing of importance remains inside.)
(You gently shake the gaming machine, but nothing happens.)
(This oldest machine appears to have broken down earlier than the others. There's nothing inside it.)
(A metallic glint catches your eye from the darkness of the prize dispenser. <color=#3399ff>A token</color> drops out.)
(Found <color=#3399ff>a dust-covered token</color> on the display screen)
(In the corner of the flowerbed, <color=#3399ff>a token</color> sits quietly, half-embedded at an angle in the soil. Someone must have dropped it here.)

Name: Eleanor
Text: I heard some people toss coins above the ceiling lights, they believe it brings good luck... Need a hand?
(A playing card flies from Eleanor's hand, precisely striking the coin placed on the ceiling light and knocking it down.)
(Catch the <color=#3399ff>tokens</color> in your hand before they hit the ground)

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Thanks...

Name: Eleanor
Text: You're welcome, just a little trick I picked up a long time ago.
(The rich aroma of brewing coffee wafts through the air. Looking over, you see Eleanor delicately sipping a cup of coffee.)
(After a brief rest, the tantalizing aroma awakens a sudden pang of hunger within you.)

Name: Eleanor
Text: Ah... I'm stuffed, what a shame.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Could you help me finish this?

Name: Eleanor
Text: Or maybe not, it might be rude... to give someone something you've already tasted, right?

Name: Eleanor
Text: (Smile)

Name: Eleanor
Text: You're not even getting riled up… are you?

Name: Eleanor
Text: My choice will be "rock".

Name: Eleanor
Text: Here, I'll go with "scissors".

Name: Eleanor
Text: The card to be played face down is "paper".

Name: Eleanor
Text: Punishment time? That's a cute face...

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (Forces yourself to cut off a piece of "cake" and swallow it.)

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (The texture is completely unlike any dessert you can imagine, yet despite its bizarre flavor, it's surprisingly not difficult to swallow.)

Name: Eleanor
Text: Then I'll take a taste. Are you curious about the flavor? Why not try it yourself next time?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (The lady before you has eaten half of the cake, her expression looking as if she's truly savoring this dessert.)

Name: Eleanor
Text: Choosing trust in a loop of suspicion and doubt... you're getting more and more interesting to me.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Doubt and trust both hold the same power... but in a game, they can easily lead people down a dark path, don't you think?

Name: Eleanor
Text: I'm starting to wonder if you actually enjoy the taste of that stuff.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (Perhaps due to the previous experience, you are gradually getting used to its taste this time.)

Name: Eleanor
Text: Loser pays up, looks like you're letting me have all the tasting opportunities?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: (She continues eating the remaining cake with visible satisfaction on her face.)

Name: Eleanor
Text: There's an unfinished game here... Want to try to finish it?

Name: Eleanor
Text: Though, a game without punishments or rewards tends to kill the competitive spirit...

Name: Eleanor
Text: How about the loser tries this?

Name: Eleanor
Text: Take it easy. Maybe it just looks a little strange?
Defeat the enemies!
Aerial Bonus
10-Combo Complete
100-Combo Complete
200-Combo Complete

Name: Village Head
Text: Bloody Hetero-Creatures!

Name: Village Head
Text: The Hetero-Creatures' assault has been temporarily halted. Thank you.

Name: Village Head
Text: Many residents got lost because of the Hetero-Creatures' attack...

Name: Village Head
Text: Could you help me find them?

Name: Village Head
Text: Thanks to your help, everyone is safe and sound.

Name: Village Head
Text: There may still be Hetero-Creatures lurking around in the town. Shall we do a full sweep together?

Name: Male Villager
Text: Ugh... my family... we got separated...

Name: Male Villager
Text: Sob... Thank you! My family is safe.

Name: Female Villager
Text: Thank you... Those monsters were terrifying...

Name: Female Villager
Text: I'm glad everyone's okay.

Name: Child Villager
Text: Thank you!

Name: Child Villager
Text: When are we eating? Are you going to eat with us?

Name: Gung-hoer Leader
Text: I wonder how my brothers are doing...

Name: Gung-hoer Leader
Text: My brother! I knew you would be alright. Come on, tell me how many of those things you took down out there.

Name: Gung-hoer
Text: Thanks for your help, mate. I ain't scared of those Hetero-Creatures, hmph!

Name: Gung-hoer
Text: I... I got one! No, wait... two! Thanks to this mate right here.

Name: Village Head
Text: May I invite you to take a photo with us all? New Oakley will never forget what you've done for us. Your story will be passed down here.

Name: Village Head
Text: New Oakley will never forget what you've done for us. Your story will be passed down here.

Name: Village Head
Text: Thank you so much for your help. If there's anything you ever need, New Oakley will do\nits best to provide.

Name: Gung-hoers
Text: Brother!

Name: Villagers
Text: Thank you for everything! We'll remember you forever!

Name: Village Head
Text: We just made this pizza together. It's not much, but please enjoy it!

Name: Alpha
Text: Want me to keep an eye on the surroundings...? Fine, I'll help, but just this once.

Name: Alpha
Text: You... are strong.

Name: Tatyana
Text: This strange machine... what exactly is it?!

Name: Tatyana
Text: Tch, another crazy Corrupted machine!

Name: Tatyana
Text: Something feels strange... Why do I have a feeling that this isn't my first time encountering this crazy Corrupted machine?!

Name: Tatyana
Text: And it seems even stronger than last time. How annoying!!

Name: Bianca
Text: Commandant, please follow me.

Name: Bianca
Text: This is where the Sacred Prayer Ritual is held.

Name: Bianca
Text: Is that so? Though... it's not something I often see...

Name: Bianca
Text: It's much the same as always, though I seldom have the chance to see it myself...

Name: Bianca
Text: How about we slow time down a little?

Name: Bianca
Text: Just a little privilege of being the Holy Maiden. There's still much to prepare, so...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...My apologies, Commandant. I let my haste get the better of me.

Name: Bianca
Text: Yeah, let's take it slowly.

Name: Bianca
Text: While I prepare for the ritual, feel free to speak with the others. I'll be waiting here for you.

Name: Bonnie
Text: Oh, you're finally here. Listen, I told her it's fine to show a little affection when she's with someone she cares about.

Name: Bonnie
Text: She always brushes me off—"duty this, mission that!" But the second I bring you up? She just gets quiet.

Name: Bonnie
Text: I could tell she wants to let loose, but her position makes it hard.

Name: Bonnie
Text: Sooo... I may have fibbed a little and said your injury isn't fully healed yet, you know, so she has to take care of you.

Name: Bonnie
Text: Play along later, okay? Don't make it awkward for her!

Name: Father Snow
Text: ...It seems she has found what she wants to protect.

Name: Father Snow
Text: ...Heh, it's nothing. I put the lily seeds over there. You might need them during the ritual.

Name: Venice
Text: Look, the Holy Maiden and that commandant are holding hands! They're kind of like...

Name: Venice's Sister
Text: Like Mom and Dad?

Name: Venice
Text: Right, right... Wait, no no no!

Name: Rosie
Text: You mean like... lovers, right?

Name: Venice
Text: Yeah, lovers!

Name: Rosie
Text: But... Holy Maiden has to hold up the Sacred Sword someday. What if the curse...

Name: Venice
Text: Don't worry! The commandant will protect her, right?

Name: Davis
Text: Commandant, you're finally here!

Name: Davis
Text: I've been... blacking out more and more these days. Feels like my body's not even mine anymore. At this rate, I don't think I've got much time left...

Name: Davis
Text: My mom's still waiting back home... If you ever swing by, say hi for me, will ya?

Name: Davis
Text: Hahaha, just kidding. The Holy Maiden's blessings have given us all some peace of mind. I'm feeling better now.

Name: Davis
Text: Though... I hear her blessing for you is special. Don't go wasting it, alright?

Name: Bianca
Text: Lily seeds? I was just about to fetch them... It seems the heavens have aligned our thoughts.

Name: Bianca
Text: Father Snow has brought back some lily seeds. While I prepare, might I ask you to fetch them for me?

Name: Bianca
Text: Let us begin, then.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's a bit early in the year, but it's already warm enough for the flowers to bloom.

Name: Bianca
Text: Bonnie told me your injuries haven't fully healed.

Name: Bianca
Text: Here, give me your hands and close your eyes.

Name: Bianca
Text: O Heavenly Father, may You send gentle winds to smooth the folds of suffering and soft snow to fill the trenches of our scars...

Name: Bianca
Text: Even if Your gaze can only watch over living souls, may the threads bind their pain to my palms...

Name: Bianca
Text: Let 【kuroname】's blood share warmth with mine, and let 【kuroname】's heart beat with the same warmth as mine.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...I've already checked. You seem perfectly healthy now. Is there really anything wrong?

Name: Bianca
Text: You aren't actually ill, are you?

Name: Bianca
Text: You... and Bonnie...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...You know that the Snowfields haven't been peaceful this year, right?

Name: Bianca
Text: Monsters crawled out from the "Abyss" and attacked the towns. Then the plague broke out... and blizzards raged for over a month.

Name: Bianca
Text: Only at the summit of the mountain can my prayers reach the divine most clearly.

Name: Bianca
Text: I'd stay with you if I could... but my prayers at the summit are for the sake of all, including you.

Name: Bianca
Text: I'm touched that you worry for me... but this is my sacred duty.

Name: Bianca
Text: Well... how about this?

Name: Bianca
Text: No matter where you are, I will always protect you. Even when I'm not by your side, my prayers will bless you, Commandant.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: I see.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: What did you say?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: How are you feeling?
Lily Seed x1

Name: Liv
Text: You shouldn't have left that child to her own devices...

Name: Meli
Text: But what else... could I have done?

Name: Meli
Text: I couldn't give her love like a human could. So I gave her everything else she asked for... including you, and that human.

Name: Liv
Text: She's drawing energy from the minerals... We have to stop her!

Name: Meli
Text: It's useless...

Name: Liv
Text: I can see your love for her. But I... I have someone I must protect too.

Name: Liv
Text: Wake up, Melinoe...

Name: Liv
Text: Let's move out, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Huff... Feeling rested? Then let's go.

Name: Liv
Text: Hmm? A recording device... looks like the Rodent Squad left it behind.

Name: Flayo
Text: This is Flayo of the Rodent Squad. We're clearing the mine when we stumbled on a hidden lab inside...

Name: Liv
Text: That noise drew too many monsters. If we rush in now, the mine could collapse...

Name: Liv
Text: Are those the crane controls on that platform?

Name: Liv
Text: Down below... is that a new tunnel entrance?

Name: Liv
Text: Let's go check it out, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, there's another crane and some rocks here...

Name: Liv
Text: ...There's a hollow space beneath us. We might be able to clear a path with the crane, like before.

Name: Liv
Text: This crane isn't fully powered. There must be more switches around here. Let's look for them, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: ...Drones... Still following their original programs? Where are they headed?

Name: Liv
Text: These vehicles are still operational... We can use them to reach the lab ahead.

Name: Liv
Text: A new supply crate!

Name: Liv
Text: There's a camp up ahead, Commandant. Let's rest a bit.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... what kind of research do you think they did here?

Name: Liv
Text: The Rodent Squad... I've only ever heard the name. Never had the chance to work with them myself.

Name: Liv
Text: There are hover platforms over there... We can use them to reach the platform with the vehicles.

Name: Liv
Text: There's the entrance! With the hover platforms, we can get to the vehicle platform next.

Name: Liv
Text: This vehicle will take us to the next area.

Name: Liv
Text: Ugh... Who's there?! Commandant, watch out!
(Maniacal laughter)

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant! You're safe... thank goodness.

Name: Flayo
Text: This place... the magnetic field here forms a strange cycle...

Name: Flayo
Text: We've tested it many times and learned the pattern...

Name: Flayo
Text: If you spot an anomaly, turn back. If not, keep going. Do it right eight times, and you'll get through.

Name: Liv
Text: A strange cycle... Commandant, let's move ahead and test it.

Name: Liv
Text: The magnetic field is distorted... we're back where we started. Did we miss an "anomaly" just now?

Name: Liv
Text: What is this...! A mechanoid... child?!

Name: Liv
Text: We made it out... This should be the end of the mine.
(Several scratches, like those left by metal limbs scraping across rock, mark one wall.)
(It looks like a small mechanoid child, carefully maintained. The frame is clean and tidy but must have fallen, breaking its core beyond repair.)

Name: Meli
Text: (Gasps in pain)

Name: Meli
Text: Still falling for it, Liv?

Name: Meli
Text: Took the bait again.

Name: Meli
Text: Still holding back? How kind of you...

Name: Meli
Text: I'm no fighter... She'll take you on.

Name: Meli
Text: Not enough power... but time is on our side.

Name: Meli
Text: No... not yet...

Name: Meli
Text: You'll hurt her only over my dead body!

Name: Meli
Text: ...Hesitating, Liv?

Name: Meli
Text: I see your sorrow. I hear your pain.

Name: Meli
Text: Let it go. Stay here with me.

Name: Meli
Text: Geez...

Name: Meli
Text: Done hiding?

Name: Meli
Text: Hear their screams...

Name: Meli
Text: Very well.

Name: Meli
Text: Where can you run?

Name: Meli
Text: Watch yourself.

Name: Meli
Text: It's not over.

Name: Meli
Text: Bind, die.

Name: Meli
